import React from 'react' import {useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Cookies from 'js-cookie' import '../css/NavBar.css' const NavBar = (props) => { const navigate = useNavigate() const {sessionId, setSessionId, userInfo, setUserInfo} = props; const logOut = () => { setSessionId("") setUserInfo({}) Cookies.remove("sessionId") navigate("/") } const addProduct = () => { navigate("/product/add") } const selectCategory = (category) => { navigate("/category/" + category) } return (
